Package it.polimi.ingsw.CommunicationProtocol.ClientServer.Packets

package it.polimi.ingsw.CommunicationProtocol.ClientServer.Packets
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.CommunicationProtocol.ClientServer
     
  • Class
    Description
    ClientServerPacket
    The ClientServerPacket class represents a packet sent from the client to the server.
    CSPChangeColor
    Packet sent from the client to the server to change the user's lobby color.
    CSPDrawCard
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request drawing a card from a specific card pool.
    CSPJoinLobby
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request joining a specific lobby.
    CSPLogIn
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request a login operation.
    CSPLogOut
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request a logout operation.
    CSPPickObjective
    Packet sent from the client to the server to indicate the selection of a secret objective.
    CSPPlayCard
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request playing a card on a coordinate.
    CSPQuitLobby
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request quitting the current lobby.
    CSPSendChatMessage
    Packet sent from the client to the server to send a chat message.
    CSPSignUp
    Packet sent from the client to the server to sign up a new user.
    CSPStartGame
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request starting a game.
    CSPStartLobby
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request starting a new lobby.
    CSPStopViewingLobbyPreviews
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request stopping viewing lobby previews.
    CSPViewLobbyPreviews
    Packet sent from the client to the server to request viewing lobby previews.
